title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 1 - General Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 1 - General Provisions

State Regulations
§ 1.1 - Audit of payments and refunds by the comptroller
§ 1.2 - Audit of revenues and receipts by comptroller
§ 1.3 - Forms and systems of accounts
§ 1.4 - Certification of accounts and vouchers
§ 1.5 - Expenditure of state moneys other than moneys appropriated
§ 1.6 - Duplicate checks
§ 1.7 - State papers and securities
§ 1.8 - Interest of certain persons in purchases prohibited
§ 1.9 - Fraudulent bills or claims

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 1

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §
8[14]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
